author: Sorcha Pollak
title: Coronavirus: ‘The Irish Government takes care of people and hopefully that includes me’
description: American students choose to remain in Belfast and Dublin as virus spreads globally
content: When Ella Klahr Bunnell moved from Boston to Belfast last September, she wasnt nervous about living so far from her family. A recipient of a Mitchell scholarship to study on the island of Ireland, Bunnell had already spent five years as an undergraduate stude… [+3614 chars]
